text: Clifford the Big Red Dog is an animated and live action television movie series. It is based on Clifford the Big Red Dog by Norman Bridwell. == Movies == *Clifford's Really Big Movie (2004, animated) *Clifford the Big Red Dog (2021, live action) == Cast and characters == Characters Television series 2000 Animated movie Television series 2019 Live action movie Clifford the Big Red Dog Clifford's Really Big Movie Clifford the Big Red Dog Clifford the Big Red Dog 2000 2004 2019 2021 Clifford John Ritter David Alan Grier Emily Elizabeth Grey DeLisle Darby Camp T-Bone Kel Mitchell Cleo Cree Summer Shackelford Wayne Brady Dorothy Jenna Elfman Dirk Jess Harnell Rodrigo Wilmer Valderrama Larry Gablegobble Judge Reinhold George Wolfsbottom John Goodman Madison Wolfsbottom Kath Soucie P.T.
